name: The Underground Explorer
description:
Someone said, "The Internet will be the world."

"The Internet will become the world"
Someone was saying such a word.
Is such a "world" full of happiness now?
... I'm tired of thinking about that.
I ask you.
Please know the truth of this "world" on my behalf.
Please ... please ...
please forgive me. I haven't done anything wrong.
I'm sorry, I'm sorry….
A, a, a, a, a, a, a, a, a, a, "

... is the story of this game.

It is a work that took about two years.
There may be shocking scenes, grotesque scenes, etc.
Please play carefully.
